Room.Name: Southern Castle Wall
Room.ShortDescription: This is the southern hallway that runs around the castle's interior.
Room.LongDescription: Evidently the fire couldn't do much damage here, as it seems to be mostly stonework. A wide, iron door with rusted hinges is set into the west wall. The hallway continues to the northeast and to the northwest, curving out of sight in both directions. There is a great hallway to the north.
